text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GF Series GF63 THIN 8SC-030 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GF Series GF63 THIN 8SC-030 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG. The trackpad is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1650. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GF Series GF63 THIN 8SC-030 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG!
